I love this game however, there are a ton of complaints about how the killers are unbalanced and how the ping is a unplayable  factor. If those kind of things are a big breaker for you I would not get this game. On the other hand however, you have a fun game that with the right perk setup both the killers and survivors are very balanced. Would not recommend to whiny b***h boys.

Apesar de ser repetitivo o jogo, √© bastante emocionante e causa muita adrenalina. Gr√°ficos bons e de √≥tima compatibilidade com hardwares inferiores. Um dos melhores jogos de suspence/terror que j√° joguei!
The best game i have never play

Dead by Daylight is a one-vs-four game of cat and mouse. One player takes on the role of the killer, while the rest play survivors. The goal of the survivors is to.. well, survive and do so buy stealthing around the map trying to find generators to fix to power the escape door. Survivors cannot be offensive in any way. Each survivor has a character-based talent (such as being able to not groan in pain or recovering from a jump landing faster than normal). In addition, items can be found and used to thwart the killer's efforts. These kinds of things include flashlights to shine in the killer's face or tools that can disassemble the large meathook assemblies the killer uses to hang you while he hunts for others.

And the killer.. you guessed it.. is there to toy with and ultimately end the lives of each of the survivors. As a killer, there are many different types to pick from. This is one of the really neat things about this game. Killers can be a twisted hillbilly, a mentally unstable electro-shock therapist, or even favorites from movies (such as Michale Myers from Halloween or Freddy from Nightmare on Elm Street). Each one has their own "weapon". Some use chainsaws, some their claws, while others slash away. Each has their own powers that are unique and unknown to the group until the killer reveals his or herself.

Gameplay is tense no matter which side you choose. Obviously moreso for the survivors. Running causes a trail the killer can see, as does bleeding. If you miss your skill check while fixing a generator, a loud noise can be heard and the killer is alerted visually as well. Run by any birds in trees and they'll squawk and fly away. The killer receives all manner of clues as to your presence if you're not being careful. However, the killer is only afforded first person view, while the survivors get the more cheatery third person view.

Graphically, the game is mediocre. Character design is very basic on the survivor side. The killers are molded in a similar manner. Thematically, the killers have a wide variety to pick from. Characters move decently well across the map, with only minor issues with navigating around structures, windows, and ledges. Character animations are sufficient, but could use some work as well. When it comes to the killer/survivor interactions, such as combat, the game plays satisfactory. If there's any department that could use an overhaul, it would be in its graphics.

The music and sound in the game is top notch though. Both add a fantastically intense experience. Survivors experience a panicked heartbeat noise as their killer draws closer and any time a skill check is failed, the noise of the generator exploding or a first aid roll that turns into someone yelping in pain.. these are the things that make you cringe while playing.

Progression in the game is done through a dark web of abilities that you purchase with points earned from the game. Each role is awarded these. Points for survivors are earned by saving other players, disabling meathooks, as well as foiling the killer directly amongst others. Killers are granted XP for stalking their prey, hooking survivors, and using their powers effectively. As you uncover the nodes on the web, eventually it will fill to the point of earning a new character level. Perks as well as consumable one-level perks can be earned in this way.

Overall, Dead by Daylight is a lot of fun if you have the nerve for it. It can be very intense at first and end in a horrible way for you. But that's part of the fun. As it appeals to a variety of types of players, the killer vs survivors angle is fun for all.
Melhor game PvP que eu ja vi sinceramente, muito divertido principalmente com amigo, recomendo muito

dead by daylight is a 1v4 horror slasher game featuring the singular player team playing as one of several killers with a unique power, versus a 4 man group of normal people playing survivors, survivors must complete generators to power exit gates to escape and survive, the killers are tasked with preventing this and killing survivors using hooks around the map, gameplay can be augmented by various things like perks. the problem with this game is the developers are incapable of listening to the fanbase in addition to allowing several bugs to remain for months to years, one I encounter often is where the game does not update correctly causing the game to forcibly close itself as it thinks game files have been tampered with when in reality the games files were not actually updated correctly, if you are unlucky like myself this results in you being removed from a trial, and banned from entering another match for 5 minutes. even though none of it was your fault, you are being punished for the games mistakes, as a player that has played in higher ranks for both the killers and survivors it is clear the developers cannot balance game mechanics either, certain killers have unfairly strong powers or addons and many survivors have perks that are in the same boat, survivors have an easier time winning than killers, to the point where its a running joke that the survivors are the dangerous ones, not the killer. this game has failed on several occasions to make the game fun for both sides, until the developers actually put forth an effort to fix the game instead of half-assed sleazy cash grab schemes like battle passes and the disgrace of the current halloween event I strongly advise against purchasing dead by daylight. go play civilizations 5 instead.

Es un gran juego de persecusion y terror. Posee varios personajes reconocibles de asesinos. Es un juego que en poco tiempo puedes aprender a jugar de manera decente. Lo recomiendo comprar en oferta, siempre esta presente.

Uno de los g√©neros que ha tenido un peque√±o auge en la industria es el de los Survival Horror multijugador, donde un asesino busca deshacerse de un grupo de supervivientes por el simple hecho de que puede hacerlo. A esto se le suma el aspecto retro con el que los juegos cuentan al utilizar asesinos de pel√≠culas conocidas como Jason y Michael Myers, dando ese toque de nostalgia que algunos jugadores buscan.


Otro de los g√©neros que ha tenido un peque√±o auge en la industria es el de los Survival Horror multijugador, donde un asesino busca deshacerse de un grupo de supervivientes por el simple hecho de que puede hacerlo. A esto se le suma el aspecto retro con el que los juegos cuentan al utilizar asesinos de pel√≠culas conocidas como Jason y Michael Myers, dando ese toque de nostalgia que algunos jugadores buscan.


Si bien las gr√°ficas no son tan detalladas como uno podr√≠a esperar y algunos modelos se ven emplastados, es algo que no te preocupar√°, mientras vas corriendo por tu vida a trav√©s de un pastizal. Para compensar esto, los dise√±adores se empe√±aron en crear todo el ambiente de terror con √°rboles torcidos y modelos de caba√±as y muros viejos, acompa√±ados de cuervos y otros objetos como camas de hospital y botes destruidos dependiendo del mapa.

Y para complementar el ambiente planteado por los desarrolladores, Dead By Daylight utiliza tonadas largas y profundas para marcar un tempo lento y aterrador. Adem√°s de esto, el juego utiliza tambi√©n este gran trabajo realizado en el ambiente dentro de las mec√°nicas del juego, ya que los supervivientes podr√°n escuchar cuando el asesino se acerca o pueden conocer su ubicaci√≥n si es que asusta a la vida salvaje del mapa, mientras que el asesino puede escuchar los pasos y quejidos de los supervivientes para darse una idea de donde se encuentran. Con todo esto en mente querr√°s utilizar aud√≠fonos mientras juegas para poder escuchar hasta el m√°s m√≠nimo crujido de rama en el juego.


En cuanto a la historia del juego, a pesar de que previamente mencionamos que Dead By Daylight no cuenta con un modo historia, el t√≠tulo provee con un poco de trasfondo para cada uno de los personajes presentes en el juego, d√°ndote una idea de porque los supervivientes cuentan con tales habilidades y porque los asesinos habitan ciertos mapas en especial y cuentan con esas habilidades. Tal vez no sea lo suficiente para crear teor√≠as conspiratorias para los personajes, pero es lo suficiente como conocer a cada personaje un poco y que te puedas identificar con ellos.

Pero lo importante en Dead By Daylight es la jugabilidad y, si bien, la ambientaci√≥n se lleva el premio mayor, el juego tiene lo suyo. El juego se basa en que los supervivientes intentan escapar y mantenerse vivos y para esto deber√°n reparar generadores que se encuentran alrededor del mapa que requieren de reflejos r√°pidos por parte de los jugadores para presionar un bot√≥n en eventos r√°pidos mientras el generador se repara. En cuanto al asesino, su labor ser√° acechar y matar a los supervivientes, utilizando sus habilidades para encontrarlos y poder golpearlos un par de veces para despu√©s cargarlos a un gancho donde deber√°n esperar a que una ara√±a salga del cielo y se lleve al superviviente atado al gancho, pero los supervivientes a√∫n cuentan con una oportunidad para vivir si es que logran ser rescatados por otra persona.


Adem√°s de las habilidades de cada personaje, podr√°s obtener otros √≠tems o mejoras temporales a trav√©s de un √°rbol de habilidades que se genera aleatoriamente cada que lo completas. Cada personaje contar√° con su propio √°rbol de habilidades, el cual ir√°s desbloqueando con puntos obtenidos durante las partidas. Puede que el √°rbol de habilidades no sea tan √∫til como uno desear√≠a, pero esto logra el cometido de que los jugadores nuevos puedan estar casi al mismo nivel que los jugadores que llevan tiempo jugando.

Puede que suene un poco simple y repetitivo, ya que el objetivo durante todos los juegos es el mismo, pero son los jugadores los que hacen de cada partida algo diferente. Al ser un t√≠tulo completamente multijugador, Dead By Daylight depende m√°s de los jugadores para formar un juego entretenido y duradero, por lo que jugar con amigos y otras personas es lo que har√° que disfrutes el t√≠tulo. Pero a esto se le interpone un gran problema, jugar con amigos en l√≠nea es casi imposible a menos que tengas un grupo de 5 personas, buscar una partida con un grupo de amigos resulta en tiempos de espera interminables, mientras que si buscas por tu cuenta podr√°s comenzar a jugar en un par de minutos a lo mucho.
Das Spiel macht sehr viel Spa√ü.
I recommend this game to everyone who like to play in team (or alone).

I really enjoy this game! You wont always have good team mates but you do get some that rather farm and worry about themselves. 9/10 of the time I'm lucky to get helpful people or a nice killer if my team decides to rage quit over getting caught. Being a killer is super fun too but at times depending on your time zone it can be hard to find a game as one.  Over all I really liked the game.  As long as you remember that the Killers job is to actually Kill you and there is perks to help them find you better, alert them, track you ect depending on the killers traits...then it's all fun and in good fun. I have yet found a "hacker" but more or less just someone who knows how to build a good Killer that knows what perks work best for them. Survivors can do the same...I play Feng and she is really cool once you get the right perks on her to help quickly fix generators and keep alert to when Killer is near, Meg is awesome as well if you get the right perks on her to survive and get away from the Killer. Advice: Always work with the Perks...They are key...if you die a lot then change up your perks, If you are a killer and can't kill very well...again..Perks. =^_^=  9/10 rating, Play smart, Play quiet and stay calm.  Keep safe out there. =^_^=

The game is fun for the most part. I play both killer and survivor. The only bad thing is when you are placed against a survive with friends 4 man team, which pretty much makes it impossible to win even if you have your strongest add ons, which ultimatley ruins the game for me.
My Favorit Game since i giot it! Fun every day!
